name: Care/of
headline: A frontend overhaul built for speed at a user-focused wellness company.
paragraphs: I currently work at Care/of, a wellness company based in New York City. My team and I are in the process of rebuilding the site's entire front end in Next.js. Over the course of the past year and a half, we've moved over 80% of the site's traffic to our new app, resulting in signifcantly faster load times and an elevated user experience.
Some of my work at Care/of includes rebuilding the product catalog and cart, implementing the front end of a new gift card system, and re-architecting and rebuilding the vitamin recommendation quiz.

head.title: Care/of - Camden Phalen
head.description: A frontend overhaul built for speed at a user-focused wellness company.
